name: Bell Hop
overview:
Bell Hop is an arcade game and a version of Apple's Bellhop.

The player plays as a bellhop, who tries to deliver the maximum number of gifts before their tip runs out. The player can move left and right. Gifts appear in the bottom right of the screen, and the player must ride an elevator to the upper floors to deliver them and return to the bottom right for another one. Unlike in the original game, Bell Hop features a ghost that occasionally steal the gifts.
